case_title: United States of America v. Tanner et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Tanner et al

charges.charge_description: 18:1349 Attempt and conspiracy to commit bank fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant resentenced on 12/20/2016 to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 41 months as to each of Counts 1-6 of the Indictment, each such term to be served concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release, Defendant shall serve a 5 year term of supervised release as to each of Counts 1-4 of the Indictment, and a 3 year term of supervised release as to each of Counts 5-6 of the Indictment, each such term to be served concurrently, with standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. The Court waives the fine in this case. Defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of $1,313,829.89 as set forth on the record, which is due and payable immediately. Defendant shall pay a $600.00 special assessment as to Counts 1-6 of the Indictment, which is due immediately.

Upon release, Defendant shall serve a 5 year term of supervised release as to each of Counts 1-4 of the Indictment, and a 3 year term of supervised release as to each of Counts 5-6 of the Indictment, each such term to be served concurrently, with standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. charges.charge_description: 18:1349 Attempt and conspiracy to commit bank fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 1 day as to Count 1 of the Indictment. Upon release, Defendant shall serve a 2 year term of supervised release, with standard and special conditions of supervision imposed, the first six months of which shall include location monitoring on home detention. The Court waives the fine in this case. Defendant shall pay restitution, jointly and severally with co-Defendant Derryl L. Tanner, in the amount of $670,000.00 to First Place Bank now Bayview Loan Servicing, which is due and payable immediately. Defendant shall pay a $100.00 special assessment as to Count 1 of the Indictment, which is due immediately.
Dismissed by the Government at Sentencing.
